attributes.action: "Would the Government get the Peoples Vote Today?" Debate
attributes.additional_details: I believe the Government has lost the support of the people because Britain has achieved the highest death rate for Covid19 in Europe and the second highest in the World I believe we all need to know whether or not they have the People's Vote now.  These statistics could be considered to be an unmitigated disaster for our country. The statistics could not have been worse.  Does our country need more competent leaders?
attributes.background:
I want all the Members of Parliament to establish what their constituents feelings are on this subject.

I want a Petition to ascertain the feeling of the nation at this moment in time.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
